description: Prompts the subject to enter their subject ID.
name: Subject ID
title: Subject ID

fields.html: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

label.html: Which hand do you write with?
Which hand do you throw with?
1. How often do you have a drink containing alcohol?
How many drinks on average do you have per occasion?
Have you had more than 4 drinks on any occasion in the last three months?
2. How much do you smoke on average per day?
When was the last time you smoked?
3. How much Caffeine (caffeinated soda, coffee, caffeinated tea) on average do you consume per day?

fields.html: 1 cup (12 oz soda, 6 oz coffee, 6 oz tea)

label.html: When was the last time you had caffeine?

fields.html:
For each question, choose the answer that best describes how often that statement applies to you. Many of these questions ask about your interactions with other people. Please think about the way you are with most people, rather than special relationships you may have with spouses or significant others, children, siblings, and parents. Everyone changes over time, which can make it hard to fill out questions about personality. Think about the way you have been the majority of your adult life rather than specific periods in your life or times you may have felt different than normal.

***Casual interaction with acquaintances, rather than special relationships such as with close friends and family.

rows.html: I like being around other people.

I keep doing things the way I know, even if another way might be better.

fields.html: <h4>During the past month, how often has each of the following behaviors been a problem?<h4>
